hibernate-mapping.sql-query: from Duty duty where 1 = 1 <if isNotBlank(code) ||isNotBlank(name)||isNotBlank(dutyLevel) || isNotBlank(remark)> and (1 = 2 <if isNotBlank(code)> or lower(duty.code) like '%${code?lower_case}%' </if> <if isNotBlank(name)> or lower(duty.name) like '%${name?lower_case}%' </if> <if isNotBlank(dutyLevel)> or lower(duty.dutyLevel) like '%${dutyLevel?lower_case}%' </if> <if isNotBlank(remark)> or lower(duty.remark) = lower(:remark) </if> ) </if> order by code asc,name
